import React from'react';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import'./BESSHighlights.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BESSHighlights=()=>{// Animation variants for staggered entrance
const containerVariants={hidden:{opacity:0},visible:{opacity:1,transition:{staggerChildren:0.3,delayChildren:0.2}}};const textVariants={hidden:{opacity:0,y:40,scale:0.95},visible:{opacity:1,y:0,scale:1,transition:{duration:0.7,ease:[0.4,0,0.2,1]}}};const imageVariants={hidden:{opacity:0,scale:1.1,rotateY:10},visible:{opacity:1,scale:1,rotateY:0,transition:{duration:0.9,ease:[0.4,0,0.2,1]}}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"bess-highlights-section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bess-highlights-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.div,{className:"bess-highlights-content",variants:containerVariants,initial:"hidden",whileInView:"visible",viewport:{once:true,amount:0.4},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.div,{className:"bess-highlights-text",variants:textVariants,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"bess-highlights-subheading",children:"OUR LATEST BESS HIGHLIGHTS"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"bess-highlights-title",children:"Transforming Energy Storage Solutions"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"bess-highlights-description",children:"Discover how Cleanco's innovative battery storage projects are revolutionizing renewable energy integration and grid stability across India."})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.div,{className:"bess-highlights-image-wrapper",variants:imageVariants,initial:"hidden",whileInView:"visible",viewport:{once:true,amount:0.4},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/images/cleanco_12.png",alt:"Cleanco BESS Facility - Industrial battery energy storage systems under blue sky",className:"bess-highlights-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bess-highlights-overlay",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"overlay-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Advanced Energy Storage"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"State-of-the-art BESS technology powering India's renewable energy future"})]})})]})]})})});};export default BESSHighlights;
